Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires certain business recipients of state aid to perform an annual assessment of the business' social and environmental impact as assessed against a third party standard
Summary: Requires certain business recipients of state aid to perform an annual assessment of the business' social and environmental impact as assessed against a third party standard.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Amd §§3, 30 & 30-a, UDC Act; add Art 23 §§450 - 452, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act and the economic development law, in relation to requiring certain business recipients of state aid to perform an annual assessment of the business' social and environmental impact as assessed against a third party standard
